title: Ray of Frost
tags: how to acquire ray of frost
content:
Ray of Frost Evocation Cantrip 1~8 Damage 1d8 Cold Reduce the target's movement speed by 3m. 1 turn 18m Attack Roll Action

Evocation Cantrip

Reduce the target's movement speed by 3m.

Ray of Frost is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Ray of Frost is a Cantrip from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Ray of Frost Information

Description: Reduce the target's movement speed by 3m. Level: Can
